guestthoughts.CantSeeAnimal: I can't see any animals from here!
guestthoughts.DessertBad: This zoo needs some dessert carts!
guestthoughts.Tired: I'm exhausted. I need a place to rest.
guestthoughts.AmusementBad: This zoo isn't amusing enough for me.
guestthoughts.Bathroom: I need to find a bathroom soon.
guestthoughts.TrashGround: I'm upset at the lack of trash cans.
guestthoughts.TrashFull: Gross! I can't find a trash can that isn't overflowing!
guestthoughts.EatBurgerNotLike: I'd prefer something other than a burger.
guestthoughts.EatBurgerLove: I really love to eat burgers.
guestthoughts.EatHotdogNotLike: I'd prefer something other than a hotdog.
guestthoughts.EatHotdog: I relish eating a good hotdog.
guestthoughts.EatHotdogLike: I relish eating a good hotdog.
guestthoughts.EatSaladNotLike: I'd prefer something other than a salad.
guestthoughts.EatSalad: The salad has lots of green lettuce.
guestthoughts.EatSaladLike: I really like eating the salad.
guestthoughts.EatShishkabobNotLike: I'd prefer something other than a shish-kabob.
guestthoughts.EatShishkabob: The shish-kabob has lots of veggies.
guestthoughts.EatShishkabobLove: I just love eating the shish-kabob
guestthoughts.EatSubNotLike: I'd prefer something other than a sub.
guestthoughts.EatSub: The sub sandwhich is really big.
guestthoughts.EatSubLike: I really like the sub sandwhich.
guestthoughts.EatSushiNotLike: I'd prefer something other than sushi.
guestthoughts.EatSushi: The sushi is not too fishy tasting.
guestthoughts.EatStanding: I'd prefer to sit down and enjoy my food.
guestthoughts.DrinkCoffee: The coffee smells great and tastes good.
guestthoughts.DrinkSodaNotLike: I'd prefer something other than soda.
guestthoughts.DrinkSoda: The soda has lots of bubbles.
guestthoughts.DrinkWaterNotLike: I'd prefer something other than water.
guestthoughts.DrinkWater: The water is very clear and tasty.
guestthoughts.EatCheesecakeNotLike: I'd prefer something other than cheesecake.
guestthoughts.EatCottoncandyNotLike: I'd prefer something other than cottoncandy.
guestthoughts.EatCottoncandy: The cottoncandy sticks to my face.
guestthoughts.EatCottoncandyLike: The cottoncandy sticks to my face.
guestthoughts.EatFruitcupNotLike: I'd prefer something other than a fruitcup.
guestthoughts.EatFruitcup: The fruit in the fruitcup is very fresh.
guestthoughts.EatIcecreamNotLike: I'd prefer something other than icecream.
guestthoughts.EatIcecream: The icecream is great with sprinkles.
guestthoughts.EatIcecreamLove: The icecream is great with sprinkles.
guestthoughts.EatPopcornNotLike: I'd prefer something other than popcorn.
guestthoughts.EatPopcorn: The popcorn tastes great with lots of butter.
guestthoughts.EatPretzelNotLike: I'd prefer something other than a pretzel.
guestthoughts.EatPretzel: I like mustard on my pretzel.
guestthoughts.EatPretzelLike: I really like eating the pretzel.
guestthoughts.BuyGift: I really like the gift I just bought.

guestthoughts.EatFamilyMeal: I like eating at the family restaurant.
guestthoughts.EatRegularMeal: I like eating at the restaurant.
guestthoughts.NeedUseBathroom: I really need to use the bathroom.
guestthoughts.LeaveZoo: It's time for me to go home.
guestthoughts.DonateMoney: I'm giving the zoo a donation.
guestthoughts.UseAtm: I'm glad I had enough money in my account.

guestthoughts.GetZooHat: This hat makes me look fantastic!

guestthoughts.GoSit: Is there someplace for me to sit down?

guestthoughts.ExpensiveItem: I think %s is good, but its overpriced!
